content: Firebase Auth returns 403 for expired tokens, not 401. This is different from typical auth patterns.

FFmpeg watermark transparency - Use geq filter (geq=r='r(X,Y)':g='g(X,Y)':b='b(X,Y)':a='{opacity}*alpha(X,Y)') instead of colorchannelmixer to preserve PNG transparency. colorchannelmixer destroys alpha channel.
